## Data Visualization Exercise

```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
starwars
```
### Mass vs Weight
Mass vs weight relationship through a scatterplot

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(starwars,aes(x=height,y=mass)) + geom_point() + labs(title="Mass vs Height of Starwars Characters",x="Height (cm)",y="Weight (Kg)")
```
